attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned support the UK Youth Parliament "Think Inside the BoX" campaign for compulsory political education to be taught in both primary and secondary education, ages 5 to 14, with a then optional GCSE/standard grade available to all students. We believe that the absence of this education has caused an apathy towards politics which could threaten this country's democracy, and that a better education would lead to a higher voter turnout.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to make Political Education compulsory at Primary and Secondary school in support of the UK Youth parliament "Think Inside the BoX" campaign.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=InsideTheBoX
